channel.title: photos on Regina Manansala
channel.description: Recent content in photos on Regina Manansala

item.title: A Year of Pandemic Activity
item.description: I’ve had an Apple Watch for a while now and I bought it largely because I wanted to start tracking my activity – and to, eventually, analyze this data. In order to do the latter, though, I needed to have owned, worn, and religiously tracked activities using my watch for at least 1 whole calendar year. Now in the summer of 2020, I had some down time and so I downloaded my watch data and started messing around with it.

item.title: Japan
item.description: Shibuya Center-Gai, November 2018 Kinkaku-ji, November 2018 To add a bit of color to my blog in the meantime, I’m sharing a couple photos from one of my favorite trips abroad.
